name: biomni-check-fda-drug-recalls
title: Biomni: Check FDA Drug Recalls
description: Checks FDA drug recalls database for safety information
content:
Overview

Checks FDA drug recalls database for safety information, manufacturing defects, and quality control issues. Provides comprehensive recall history including classification, reason, and affected products.

Input Parameters

  • drug_name (required): Name of drug to search for recalls
  • classification (optional): Recall classification filter (Class I, II, or III)
  • date_range (optional): Tuple or list of two dates to limit search period

Biological Use Case

Essential for pharmacovigilance, supply chain management, and patient safety monitoring. Helps healthcare providers identify potentially compromised drug products, assess risks to patients, and take appropriate action. Critical for maintaining drug quality standards and regulatory compliance.

Output

Comprehensive recall report including classification, reason for recall, affected lots, recall dates, and corrective actions saved to fda_recalls_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
